attributes.action: Ennoble Nigel Farage MEP for Services to Politics and this Country
attributes.additional_details: Mr Farage's efforts are well documented in this regard and the results of these actions have resulted in him achieving his objectives on our behalf.  We are now an independent Sovereign Country in charge of our own destiny thanks to him
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has done more than any other person in this Country to secure our independence from the EU.  He has campaigned tirelessly for this for many years often being ridiculed for his beliefs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
